snippet.title: Interstellar Space: Genesis 1.1 Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/984680/Interstellar_Space_Genesis/

The 1.1 update brings a huge graphical overhaul with completely new 3D ship models and terrains. New Gigantic galaxy map size, new space combat isometric view, new leaders and events, improved AI, score and hall of fame, more than 400 new diplomacy dialog lines of race-specific dialog added, and much more!

Interstellar Space: Genesis is a turn-based space 4X strategy game in which you attempt to build a thriving galactic empire. Discover mysteries among the stars, colonize worlds, and engage enemies in tactical turn-based combat on your journey to becoming ruler of the galaxy!

Trailer music by Mr. Grant Kirkhope. Along with Mr. Ryan McQuinn, one of the composers of the game soundtrack.
